page.title: 19TIBSHELF FISHING CLUB
page.content:
We have a fishing club in Tibshelf and on Sundays my dad goes with them for fishing matches. My brother Mark goes with him because he is in the big boys' group. I sometimes go as well.
We go fishing near Tibshelf and to places further away, like the River Trent. Last Sunday my dad won the men's section and our Mark came second in the big boys' group.
Every year, when the season has finished, we have a big presentation when all the prizes and trophies are given out. Last year my dad won the Ken Gent Shield.
by Philip (11)
